name: Super Rat-Quest
description:
!! PLAY IN FULLSCREEN !!

Mouse to select different buttons!

Middle box with name is your current card, read about it in the top middle. 

Cycle through cards with the arrows around the middle box!

Target an enemy with the "next" and "previous" enemy buttons!

Other than that, it's pretty much play to learn. Str. stands for strength/damage, Arm. stands for armor/block. The game is endless, just a high-score kind of game. Prioritize taking the best deals on stat boosts and getting a good deck!

All assets other than the music were made in the past 48 hours. The music was still made by me, but not recently.
